name: S2-16D
title: Sentinel-2 - MSI - Sen2cor - Cube LCF 16 days - v002
description: This datacube was generated with all available surface reflectance images processed using Sen2cor. The data is provided with 10 meters of spatial resolution, reprojected and cropped to BDC_SM grid Version 2 (BDC_SM V2), considering a temporal compositing function of 16 days using the Least Cloud Cover First (LCF) best pixel approach.
